scenes.background: Monica, Bob, and you continue discussing the celebration plans.
scenes.description: Bob frowns slightly and says, 'But not everyone enjoys formal dinners. It can be uncomfortable for some.'

options.text: Formal dinners can be enjoyable if we add some fun activities.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the concern and proposed a compromise, showing good perception and social skills, but empathy and self-regulation were moderate.

options.text: Maybe we can have a mix of formal and informal elements to suit everyone.
options.analysis: You showed empathy and self-regulation by considering everyone's preferences, but perception and social skill were moderate.

options.text: Formal dinners might not work for everyone, so let's think of other options too.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the concern, showing good empathy, but perception, self-regulation, and social skill were moderate.
